# function: network_is_in_subnet

Returns true if the first CIDR block is fully contained within the second CIDR block.



## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
network_is_in_subnet(child_cidr string, parent_cidr string) bool
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `child_cidr` (String) The CIDR block to check (potential subnet).
1. `parent_cidr` (String) The CIDR block that should contain the child.
